name: Milestone 1 - Project Start
description: Defines project initiation and setup activities.

name: Milestone 2 - Planning Complete
description: Marks the completion of all project planning activities.

name: Milestone 3 - Execution Review
description: Indicates that development and testing are completed and ready for review.

name: Milestone 4 - Project Closure
description: Marks the official end of the project and final documentation handover.
